page_info_list.Title: Page 198
page_info_list.Alt text: Sometimes I wish I could put actual sounds in comics, just to be able to get across the frantic little slapping sound of snappy, distressed signing.

page_info_list.Title: Page 199
page_info_list.Alt text: "Yeah, I'll start a fight. And I'll end it too!! From time out!!"

page_info_list.Title: Page 201
page_info_list.Alt text: "We don't solve our problems with violence, Piper!" Typical.

page_info_list.Title: Page 202
page_info_list.Alt text: Or to beat UP a kid.
